alert.note: Alert for Harrison (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 5:29PM EDT until May 19 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HARRISON AND EAST CENTRAL MEADE COUNTIES... At 529 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brandenburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Harrison and east central Meade Counties, including the following locations... Laconia, Evans Landing, New Boston, Rock Haven, Grahamton, Hughes Landing, Buck Grove, Brandenburg Station, Ekron and Garrett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
